page.description: Indicates if the current object is the last object on the layout.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.IS_ON_LAST_OBJECT() method returns .T. (TRUE) if the object is the last object on the layout, as specified in the layout's tab order; otherwise, it returns .F. (FALSE).

section.title: Example
section.example: dim frm as P frm = form.view("Customer Information") ? frm.Is_On_Last_Object() = .F.
